item.title: These are the new jobs AI will create
item.description: It is a fact that AI will replace some jobs. But, according to the World Economic Forum, AI will also create 97 million new jobs by 2025. What kind of jobs are they exactly?

item.title: Old-fashioned ski resort struggles with climate change
item.description: Anton Kalberer has been running a small, family-owned ski resort on Sarn-Heinzenberg in the Grisons for over half a century. The family has always tried to keep it sustainable. Now, climate change is posing a new challenge.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, mountains, ski resort, sustainability, climate change, environmental impact, winter sports, adaptation strategies, Switzerland
item.media:title: Old-fashioned ski resort struggles with climate change

item.title: Italy’s shipwreck victims
item.description: More than 80 migrants drowned off the Italian coast when their boat was wrecked. Hasib is a survivor. Vincenzo was a rescuer. Both are traumatized from the tragedy.
